definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: work, recompence (poet. and late);—cstr. [[פְּעֻלַּת]] Le 19:13 +, sf. [[פְּעֻלָּתִי]] Is 49:4, etc.; pl. cstr. [[פְּעֻלּוֹת]] Ps 17:4, [[תֽ]]- Ps 28:5; —

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of men, Ps 17:4 (pl.); toil, suffering Je 31:16; good action 2Ch 15:7, wicked Is 65:7, [[שָָׁקֶר]] ´[[פ]] Pr 11:18.

wages (as earned by work) Le 19:13, Pr 10:16 (‖[[תְּבוּאָה]]), Ez Eze 29:20; reward (from ´[[י]]) Is 49:4, Is 61:8; prob. fig. of people won back by ´[[י]] in warfare Is 40:10, Is 62:11 (‖[[שָׂכָר]]); of punishment, Ps 109:20.
